name: Quantum Playground
description:
Did you know: in Quantum Physics, objects have characteristics of both particles and waves.
Now what if I told you that you can control those shifts between particle and wave behaviors?

Do you think you could tame the tutorial?
Do you think you could score high on your leaderboard?
Higher than your friends, on the same seed-generated level?

Let's find out - enjoy ;-)

Made by:

Yann Roirand ------- [yannroirand] --- Project Manager
Yann Kiener --------- [speaf] ---------- Programmer
Antonin Browne --- [hyuponia] ------ Sound Designer

globalgamejam.org submission
